channel.title: Avalanche on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Avalanche on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: ID-21 South - Avalanche Area
item.description: Entering Avalanche Zone on ID-21 south. This area south of Banner Summit has frequent avalanches in the winter, which causes road closures.

item.title: US-40 - Berthoud Pass Backcountry Ski Information
item.description: US-40 at Berthoud Pass. Backcountry ski warning. Avalanche blasting at any time using long range weaponry.
